translation.zh: 亨氏兄弟马戏团欢迎你们

translation.en: to the greatest show in this or any other universe!
translation.zh: 观赏全天下最精彩的表演！

translation.en: -[woman gasps] -♪ And the greatest show you'll ever see ♪
translation.zh: 你们将观赏到最精彩的表演

translation.en: ♪ To the great and glorious bounty Which is me ♪
translation.zh: 观赏精彩华丽的马戏界瑰宝 也就是我

translation.en: ♪ We have thrills in the air! ♪
translation.zh: 我们有刺激的空中表演！

translation.en: ♪ And motorbikes On tightropes and trapeze ♪
translation.zh: 还有摩托车走钢丝和空中飞人

translation.en: ♪ So welcome! Welcome! A thousand thrills and then some ♪
translation.zh: 所以欢迎大家！ 欢迎！精彩刺激 亮点频频

translation.en: ♪ And best of all for you It's starring me! ♪
translation.zh: 最大的亮点是本人主演！

translation.en: -[all laughing] -You're welcome. So pleased to meet me.
translation.zh: 不客气 所以你们见到我很高兴

translation.en: Well, the pleasure is all yours. [clears throat]
translation.zh: 这是你们所有人的荣幸
最有益身心健康的欢迎

translation.en: ♪ To all of the excitement that you seek ♪
translation.zh: 这里有你们想要的一切刺激表演

translation.en: ♪ Now bask in every utterance I speak! ♪
translation.zh: 现在竖起耳朵 聆听我的每一句话！
我们有全场走的杂耍演员

translation.en: ♪ Chinese acrobats From the farthest East ♪
translation.zh: 来自遥远东方的中国杂技演员

translation.en: ♪ So welcome! Welcome! Oh, for heaven's sake, welcome! ♪
translation.zh: 所以欢迎！欢迎！ 哦 上帝明鉴 欢迎！

translation.en: ♪ Lay your eyes Upon a very pleasant feast ♪
translation.zh: 睁大双眼 观赏这场视觉盛宴

translation.en: ♪ And upon yours truly Last but never least ♪
translation.zh: 真诚感谢你们 最后最重要的

translation.en: ♪ In the interest of decorum I must resist as I per-forum ♪
translation.zh: 为了恪守礼仪 我表演时必须忍住

translation.en: ♪ One mustn't toot one's own horn Too, too loud ♪
translation.zh: 人不能太大声吹捧自己

translation.en: ♪ But in truth, I must confess I cannot help but profess ♪
translation.zh: 但说实话 我必须坦白 我忍不住就是要公开宣布
我英魂潇洒 闪亮登场

translation.en: ♪ To have loose-fit earthly bounds Cha-cha ♪
translation.zh: 帅出天际 没有天理 恰恰 所以我说
请接受我们的热烈欢迎

translation.en: ♪ To a smorgasbord of delights For the eye! ♪
translation.zh: 来一场赏心悦目的自助大餐！

translation.en: ♪ And we offer up to you ♪
♪ On behalf of me, myself, and I! ♪

translation.zh: NETFLIX 出品 霍雷肖·亨廷顿！

translation.en: One half of the world-famous Huntington Brothers Circus!
translation.zh: 世界闻名的 亨氏兄弟马戏团的半壁江山

translation.en: Which half, I'll let you decide.
translation.zh: 至于是哪一半 我让你来决定
慢点吃 切斯特菲尔德
你听见欢呼声了吗 小老弟？

translation.en: I'm going to be rich as Rockefeller, -but twice as pretty. -[woman groans]
translation.zh: 我会跟洛克菲勒一样富有 但颜值比他高一倍

translation.en: Oh, you'll partake in the riches, too.
translation.zh: 我发了财 你也有一份

translation.en: At a slightly smaller share, of course.
Oh, you know I don't care about money, Horatio. I just--
translation.zh: 哦 你知道我不在乎钱 霍雷肖 我就是…

translation.en: [Chesterfield] And everyone's favorite brother, Buffalo Bob Huntington.
translation.zh: 两兄弟中大家更喜欢的 是布法罗·鲍勃·亨廷顿

translation.en: The heart and soul of the circus.

translation.zh: 打搅了 两位亨廷顿老爷

translation.en: Oh, hey, Esmerelda. Everything all right?
translation.zh: 哦 嘿 艾斯米拉达 一切都好吗？

translation.en: I am slippings away from the fortune tellings booth
translation.zh: 我从我的算命摊溜过来

translation.en: -to introduce you to... -[groans] ...beautiful niece visiting from old country.
translation.zh: 向你们介绍我老家过来的漂亮侄女

translation.en: Hopes you will give her job.
translation.zh: 希望你们能给她一份工作

translation.en: [Horatio] We don't need more mouths to feed!
translation.zh: 再多个人吃饭我们要负担不起了！

translation.en: I promise I will not be any trouble.
Oh, the apple does not fall far from the tree.
translation.zh: 跟我是一个模子刻出来的

translation.en: This apple looks like it was shot from the tree with a rocket.
translation.zh: 夫人 这个模子跟你简直是天壤之别

translation.en: [Chesterfield] Up until that point, Bob and Horatio had a good thing going.
translation.zh: 在那之前 鲍勃和霍雷肖在一起好事连连

translation.en: But you know what they say about good things...
translation.zh: 但你知道有句老话 好事…

translation.en: -[knock on door] -Horatio, hold on to your hat
translation.zh: 霍雷肖 坐稳了别吓到

translation.en: 'cause Talia and I have something exciting to tell ya!
translation.zh: 因为塔莉娅和我有好消息要告诉你！

translation.en: Now then, I've allowed this to go on for far too long, little brother.
translation.zh: 我放任你太久了 弟弟

translation.en: Okay. I can see you're obviously not thinking straight.
translation.zh: 好的 我看出来你显然脑子不清楚

translation.en: No! I see everything quite clearly, Robert, and I am putting my foot down.
translation.zh: 不！我脑子很清醒 弟弟 我坚决反对这门婚事
-我这辈子没这么认真过 -我爱塔莉娅
-而且… -要么她走 要么我走

translation.en: [Chesterfield] Gee, I wonder what he should do.
What to do, what to do?
Ooh, this is a nail biter.
Maybe you should cut down on the carbs there, Chesterfield.
translation.zh: 也许你该少吃点碳水化合物 切斯特菲尔德

translation.en: That clown suit is looking mighty snug.
translation.zh: 这件小丑服快撑不住你了

translation.en: I could eat a chocolate elephant and never gain a pound.
translation.zh: 我可以吃下一头巧克力大象 却不会长一点肉
艾斯米拉达为新人准备了礼物

translation.en: I got it here somewhere. Ouch. Where did I put it?
translation.zh: 我从某个地方搞来的 好痛 放在哪里了？

translation.en: Oh. No, you don't want that. [laughs]
translation.zh: 不 你们不会想要这个
那位老妇人没有开玩笑

translation.en: -There was magic in that wooden box. -[kid] Come on!
translation.zh: 那个木盒里的确有魔力

translation.en: For 30 years, Buffalo Bob's Rootin' Tootin' Animal Circus
translation.zh: 30年来 布法罗·鲍勃 声名远扬的动物马戏团

translation.en: -was the biggest show in the universe. -[tiger growls]
translation.zh: 是天底下最精彩的表演

translation.en: And no one was a bigger fan than this gooney kid.
translation.zh: 最喜欢看他们演出的 是这个笨拙的小孩

translation.en: [Chesterfield] He practically grew up right there in the front row.
translation.zh: 他成长的时光 差不多都消磨在观众席第一排
喜欢看表演的不是他一个人

translation.en: [laughs] Nothing but the best for my little Zoe.
translation.zh: 给我小佐伊的当然都是最好的

translation.en: Sorry, hot dog. I guess we won't be--
translation.zh: 对不起 热狗 我想我们不能…
跟她说点什么 小鬼

translation.en: -I'm clowning around. I'm just clowning. -[kids laughing]
translation.zh: 我就是胡闹的小丑 小丑而已

translation.en: [Chesterfield] And as time passed, it turns out
translation.zh: 时光飞逝 事实证明

translation.en: Bob and Talia weren't the only ones to fall in love at the circus.
translation.zh: 在马戏团相爱的 不仅仅是鲍勃和塔莉娅

translation.en: I've been against this from the day you two met.
translation.zh: 从你们认识第一天起 我就反对你们两个交往

translation.en: Zoe comes from a respectable family.
Um... in Chesterfield's defense, he's a clown.
translation.zh: 我要为切斯特菲尔德辩解 他是个小丑

translation.en: Well, I won't have my daughter wasting her days
translation.zh: 我不会让我的女儿浪费青春年华
她是前途光明的年轻姑娘

translation.en: who's gonna be running the entire company one day.
Say, why don't you come to work for me?
translation.zh: 所以不如你来为我工作吧？

translation.en: [laughs] Yeah, at the dog biscuit factory.
translation.zh: 好啊 去狗粮厂上班
哦 不 你是认真的

translation.en: I'm gonna come work for your dad
Oh, don't listen to my dad.

translation.zh: 会没事的 你看着吧

translation.en: It'll be the best decision I ever made.
translation.zh: 这会是我这辈子做出的最好决定

translation.en: [Chesterfield] It was the worst decision he ever made.
translation.zh: 这是他这辈子做过的最糟糕的决定

translation.en: Hey, sweetie, I have a board meeting in a couple of minutes.
translation.zh: 亲爱的 我等会儿 要去参加一个董事会议

translation.en: Can you just grab Mackenzie from daycare?
translation.zh: 你能去托儿所接一下麦肯齐吗？

translation.en: -Yeah, sure thing, honey. -Oh, you're the best. Mwah!
translation.zh: 当然可以 亲爱的 你最好了

translation.en: I think I finally got her calibrated correctly.
I can... I can feel it!
Honey, if this thing actually works,
translation.zh: 亲爱的 如果这东西真的成了

translation.en: your dad's gonna stop loathing me and start liking me!
translation.zh: 你爸爸就不会讨厌我 而会喜欢我

translation.en: Stop it. You're his son-in-law. He loves you.
translation.zh: 欧文 别这么说 你是他的女婿

translation.en: Your dad has me eating dog biscuits.

translation.zh: -你知道 算是吧 -给狗吃的饼干

translation.en: -He likes you. -He has me eating dog biscuits.
-Think about that. -[giggles] I'm eating dog biscuits for a job.
translation.zh: 停下来好好想想 我的工作是吃狗饼干

translation.en: -But this, this could be my ticket-- -You mean our ticket?
translation.zh: 但这五个也许会成为我 通往成功的门票 你是说“我们的”门票？
一件神奇的东西 看好了

translation.en: Your husband had a genius idea.

translation.zh: 狗狗喜欢人类食物 对吗？

translation.en: So... we should make treats that taste like people food.
translation.zh: 所以我们应该做一些 人类食物口味的狗粮
你能梦想到的所有食物！

translation.en: She did a lot of it, most of it. She's a genius.
translation.zh: 她做了很多 做了大部分 她是天才

translation.en: Wow. Wow, wow, wow. This could work.

translation.zh: 品尝第一块饼干的荣耀？

translation.en: Well, it tastes a lot like vinegar. [hiccups]
translation.zh: 吃起来一大股醋的味道

translation.en: No. No, no, no. That one should taste like cupcakes.
translation.zh: 不会 这个应该是杯子蛋糕口味

translation.en: -What's happening to your face? -I'm getting a real hint of old sneakers.
translation.zh: -你的脸怎么了？ -我有了一种旧球鞋的感觉

translation.en: Ah! And this shouldn't be happening, either!
translation.zh: 这个机器也不应该这样！
我不知道哪里出了问题！

translation.en: -Does not smell better. -Yeah, it's... it's awful.
translation.zh: 味道闻起来没好一点 对 太难闻了

translation.en: -Well, if it isn't Sir Burps-a-lot. -[Zoe] Agh.
translation.zh: 哇 这不是老打嗝先生嘛

translation.en: Brock, what are you doing here?
translation.zh: 布罗克？你来这里干什么？

translation.en: Your dad sent me. You're late for the, uh, board meeting.
translation.zh: 你爸叫我来 你参加董事会议迟到了

translation.en: Just tell him that I need a few more minutes, okay?
translation.zh: 告诉他我等会儿就去 好吗？

translation.en: What, do I look like, an errand boy?
translation.zh: 什么 我看上去像跑腿传话的吗？

translation.en: Like some super handsome errand boy with shiny hair and big biceps,
translation.zh: 那也是超级英俊的跑腿男孩 有着闪亮的头发和硕大的二头肌
完美的嘴唇 梦幻的眼睛

translation.en: Wait, wait, wait. This wasn't the way that I left these dials yesterday.
translation.zh: 等等 昨天 我调整好的参数不是这样的

translation.en: Look at them go. Look at them go.
-How is it that he gets paid more than me? -I don't know, honey.
translation.zh: -这家伙的工资为什么比我高？ -我不知道 亲爱的

translation.en: Zoe, we have a board meeting!
translation.zh: 佐伊 我们要开董事会议！

translation.en: What are you doing in this--
They've got a mind of their own, right?
translation.zh: 它们有自己的思想 对吗？
爸爸 欧文和宾克丽

translation.en: have been working on something incredible for you.
translation.zh: 一直在为你做一项不可思议的发明

translation.en: [chuckles] You know the only surprise I like is to not be surprised!
translation.zh: 你知道我唯一喜欢的惊喜 就是没有惊喜！

translation.en: Oh, it's true. He hates surprises.
translation.zh: 哦 没错 他讨厌惊喜

translation.en: Binkley is too shy to tell you,
translation.zh: 宾克丽太害羞 不好意思告诉你

translation.en: but did you know that she is a certified genius?
translation.zh: 但你知道她是货真价值的天才吗？

translation.en: How does that help me sell dog biscuits?
translation.zh: 嗯 这对我卖狗饼干有什么帮助？

translation.en: Owen had this idea for new dog biscuit flavors,
translation.zh: 欧文想生产新口味的狗饼干

translation.en: and he asked me to build a machine to replicate people food
translation.zh: 他让我造一台 可以复制人类食物的机器 因为

translation.en: because, as we all know, dogs love eating people food.
translation.zh: 我们都知道 狗狗喜欢吃人类食物
-这让我思考… -好了 宾克丽…

translation.en: ...do dogs eat the people food because we are or do they really like it?
translation.zh: 狗狗吃人类食物 因为我们也在吃 还是因为它们真的喜欢？

translation.en: Or is it because they're eating the food that we have on our plate...
translation.zh: 或者是因为它们吃 我们盘子里的食物
让它们觉得自己得到了优待

translation.en: ...because we pat them on the head, and they go... [barks]
translation.zh: 因为然后我们拍它们的头 然后它们汪汪叫 真可爱

translation.en: it has to be because the food tastes really good...
translation.zh: 肯定是因为食物本身真的好吃…

translation.en: Can anyone understand what she's saying?
translation.zh: 谁能明白她在说什么吗？
一个字都听不懂 先生

translation.en: All I have to do is flip the switch!
translation.zh: 我要做的就是拉动开关！

translation.en: Wait. That's not the right sound. Something's wrong.
translation.zh: 等等 声音不对 有地方出问题了

translation.en: [Owen] Mr. Woodley, I am so, so--
translation.zh: 伍德利先生 我非常的…

translation.en: [Mr. Woodley] Were you gonna say you're nincompoopy?
Because that's what you are, you nincompoop!
[Brock] You know, I lettered in sports back in college. Major star.
translation.zh: 你们知道 我在大学时体育健将 大明星
我知道是这里 某个地方

translation.en: Whatever it is. I'll know it when I see it. [grunts]
translation.zh: 不管是什么东西 看到我就能认出来

translation.en: I'll find it if I have to tear the place apart!
translation.zh: 把这个地方拆了我也要把它找出来！

translation.en: He's got my bottom! He's a bottom biter!
translation.zh: 他咬我屁股！他是会咬人屁股的狗！

translation.en: They were on sale. No judging.
translation.zh: 减价的时候买的 别吐槽了

translation.en: Am I crazy, or do I smell smoke?
translation.zh: 我疯了吗 还是我闻到烟味了？
快点 你这个懒惰的小侏儒！
麦肯齐！好的 小声点

translation.en: It's way past your bedtime. Let's get upstairs.
translation.zh: 上床时候都过了 我们上楼睡觉

translation.en: Gross. What were we thinking going to dinner?
translation.zh: 恶心 我们怎么会想着去吃晚饭的？

translation.en: Oh, really? You wanted to cook after a day like this?
translation.zh: 哦 真的吗？ 经历了这样的一天你还想烧饭？

translation.en: Gross. It's in my ear, Zoe.
translation.zh: -猴子 -恶心 都进到我耳朵里了 佐伊

translation.en: Go take a shower, you big baby.
translation.zh: 去洗澡吧 你这个大宝宝

translation.en: Oh, yeah. It's in other places, too.
translation.zh: 哦 对 也跑进其他部位了

translation.en: Why would you tell me that?
translation.zh: 你为什么要跟我说这个？
抓到你了 你这个小猴子！

translation.en: There was a fire at the circus.
My Uncle Bob and Aunt Talia, they're...
translation.zh: 我的叔叔鲍勃和婶婶塔莉娅 他们…

translation.en: [Chesterfield] We are gathered here today to honor our dear friends Bob and Talia.
translation.zh: 今天我们在这里相聚 为了缅怀 我们亲爱的朋友鲍勃和塔莉娅

translation.en: Buffalo Bob Huntington was a man among men,
translation.zh: 布法罗·鲍勃·亨廷顿是人中豪杰

translation.en: A man who could belch the entire alphabet on a single breath.
translation.zh: 一个可以一边打嗝 一边一口气说出26个字母的人

translation.en: -He brought me in as a young clown -[cell phone ringing]
translation.zh: 他带年少的我入行 让我扮小丑
-我知道的一切都是他教我的 -欧文

translation.en: I call that one the "Walloping Wet Willy."
translation.zh: 我称这招为“湿手指戳耳洞”

translation.en: Not to be confused with the "Paralyzing Pee-Pee Pants."
translation.zh: 不要跟“泼水好像尿裤子” 那招弄混了

translation.en: Oh, it's vintage, but it's good.
But all kidding aside, kidding aside,
translation.zh: 不过不开玩笑了 不开玩笑

translation.en: your Uncle Bob and Aunt Talia
translation.zh: 你们的鲍勃叔叔和塔莉娅婶婶

translation.en: were people with the biggest hearts of anyone I know.
translation.zh: 是我认识的心胸最宽广的人
总是为他们的家人着想

translation.en: Gretchen, who paid for your electrolysis
translation.zh: 格雷琴 你的《大胡子女士》不幸停演后

translation.en: when your days as "the Bearded Lady" were sadly over?
translation.zh: 谁付钱让你去做脱毛手术？

translation.en: And, Bulletman, there are 206 bones in the human body,
translation.zh: 没错 还有 子弹侠 一个人有206块骨头

translation.en: which means Bob and Talia took you to the hospital
translation.zh: 也就是说鲍勃和塔莉娅带去你医院

translation.en: What do you have to say about their love and generosity?
translation.zh: 对于他们的关爱和慷慨 你有什么想说的吗？

translation.en: We were all family to Bob and Talia.
translation.zh: 我们都是鲍勃和塔莉娅的家人

translation.en: And family was everything to them.
translation.zh: 对他们来说家人是最重要的

translation.en: Oh, I simply must disagree with you on that, my corpulent clown.
translation.zh: 哦 这点恕我不能认同 肥胖的小丑

translation.en: -Wait, you weren't-- -Invited to my own brother's funeral?
translation.zh: -等等 我们没有… -邀请我来参加弟弟的葬礼？

translation.en: Yes, I seem to have unraveled that particular mystery.
translation.zh: 没错 那个谜团看来我已经解开了
罗伯特 全名布法罗·鲍勃·亨廷顿

translation.en: my blood, my brother, stole from me!
translation.zh: 我的血亲 我的弟弟 从我这里偷东西！

translation.en: Robbed me of my legacy, my love,
translation.zh: 偷走了我的事业 我的爱情

translation.en: and the last 50 years of my life!
translation.zh: 还有我生命中的至少50个年头！

translation.en: Therefore, I have come to reclaim what was rightfully mine.
translation.zh: 所以我来拿回本应属于我的东西

translation.en: Endowed by the power vested in me
by these three and a half very dangerous men,
translation.zh: 这三个半十分危险的人物

translation.en: I now pronounce this circus mine!
translation.zh: 我现在宣布这个马戏团是我的了

translation.en: And that includes the secret of the animals.
translation.zh: 包括动物的秘密也归我

translation.en: Take it to the grave, dear brother, was that your plan?
translation.zh: 带进坟墓了 亲爱的弟弟 这就是你的计划？
萨姆森、斯呆比、大魔头、西奇尼…
把这些无关人员赶出去
西奇尼在房间里四处扫视

translation.en: looking for an adversary worthy of his deadly skills. Huh?
translation.zh: 寻找值得他使出致命杀招的对手

translation.en: When he suddenly realizes he's a lover,
translation.zh: 他突然意识到自己是个情圣

translation.en: Getting a bit hot in here, no?
-♪ Like a star ♪ -[Stabby] Juggling pins to a knife fight?
I really don't see the point.
translation.zh: 我真的不明白这是什么操作

translation.en: to choose his adversaries more... [groans] ...carefully next time.
translation.zh: 下次选择对手要更加小心

translation.zh: 按照叔叔鲍勃和婶婶塔莉娅 希望的那样重建马戏团

translation.en: -Hold on. What are-- -No, I don't want to hear it.
translation.zh: -等等 你在… -不 我不想听

translation.en: Doing it. Nope. Owen, I already got the nose on.

translation.en: -No. You're not owing a circus. -Nope, I can't hear you. La, la, la.
translation.zh: -不 -不 我听不见 你不能拥有马戏团

translation.en: You're about to inherit your dad's company.
translation.zh: 你将来将继承你爸爸的公司

translation.en: I've always loved this circus, and I know you do, too!
translation.zh: 我一直喜欢这个马戏团 我知道你也喜欢

translation.en: Just need a little time to come around. I get it.

translation.en: ♪ And its working out super fine, yeah ♪
Still can't believe she would throw her life away
translation.zh: （重新盛大开演！） 还是不敢相信 她会抛弃自己的生活

translation.en: Fine Corinthian leather that cradles your butt.

translation.en: With Zoe gone to that circus,
I may as well consider having you take over the company.
translation.zh: 我可以会考虑让你接管公司

translation.en: Okay, what if we try up-up-down-down- left-right-left-right-B-A-start?
translation.zh: 好的 不如我们试试 上上下下左右左右开始怎么样？

translation.en: I don't know, Binkley. I tried that earlier, and--

translation.en: Woodley needs these accounting ledgers finished by noon.
translation.zh: 伍德利要求中午前 做完这些会计分类账

translation.en: Uh, what? [chuckles] What do I know about accounting?
translation.zh: 什么？ 我对会计了解多少？

translation.en: Which is why it's funny that he asked you to do it, right?
translation.zh: 所以他让你做这件事才好笑 是吗？

translation.en: Does it bother you when I'm this close?
translation.zh: 我靠得这个近让你心烦了？
你的口气不好闻 对

translation.en: Well, have fun screwing up the accounting and ruining the company.
translation.zh: 希望你在搞乱财务 搞垮公司的过程中获得乐趣

translation.en: Here's your morning coffee, Mr. Woodley, just how you like it.
translation.zh: 这是你的早间咖啡 伍德利先生 你喜欢的口味

translation.en: By the dawn's early light, Huntington! Haven't you finished the accounting yet?
translation.zh: 都清晨了 亨廷顿！ 会计还没做完吗？

translation.en: I'm still working on it, sir. It's very... very complicated.
translation.zh: 我还在做 先生 非常复杂

translation.en: All you need is a slide rule, some moon coordinates,
translation.zh: 你只需要一个计算尺 一些月球坐标
一个火腿三明治 搞定！

translation.en: Do you know how anything works? [chuckles]

translation.en: I know Zoe could do this in her sleep, but she's at the circus,
translation.zh: 我知道佐伊睡着了也能做好 但她去了马戏团

translation.en: and I'm stuck with you, you nincompoop!
translation.zh: 我还要忍受你 你这个笨蛋！

translation.en: I did it! I... I finally fixed it!
translation.zh: 我完成了 终于修好了！

translation.en: [stammering] Just try it, Mr. Woodley. Please?

translation.en: Not even if I were poisoned and that was the antidote.

translation.en: Uh, me? But you just told me to finish the paper--
translation.zh: 我吗？当你刚交代给我 让我完成文书…

translation.en: This tastes like spaghetti and meatballs.
translation.zh: 这个口味像是意大利面和肉丸

translation.en: -I knew it! -No, like, I mean, amaz--

translation.en: -What's happening to his face? -[stammers] I thought I fixed it!
translation.zh: 他的脸怎么了？ 我以为我修好了！

translation.en: Yeah. Sorry. I, uh... I got "Brocked."
translation.zh: 嗯 对不起 我又被布罗克刁难了

translation.en: -Could be. I mean, I don't know. -Oh, no.
translation.zh: -有可能 我是说 我不知道 -哦 不

translation.en: -I mean, I was at the circus all day. -No. No, no.
-You're trying to lure me back. -No, no. With smells?
translation.zh: 你想用气味引诱我回去

translation.en: -Why would you think that? -With cotton candy smells?
translation.zh: 你为什么会这么想？ 用棉花糖的香味？

translation.en: -Why would you be smelling cotton candy? -Because you're devious and evil.
translation.zh: 你为什么会闻到棉花糖的香味？ 因为你古灵精怪
亲爱的 麦肯齐真的很想你

translation.en: She wants you to come to the grand re-opening.
translation.zh: 她希望你明天能来 参加重新盛大开演

translation.en: We worked so hard. It'd mean the world to her.
translation.zh: 我们非常努力工作 这对于她来说就是一切

translation.en: -You gotta come. -I know, I know, I just...
Let's go see about these monsters.
translation.zh: 我们去看看是什么怪兽
我不想要爸爸样子的爸爸

translation.en: Oh, do you know what today is?
translation.zh: 你知道今天是什么日子吗？

translation.en: Mm-hmm. Circus day. Are you coming?
translation.zh: 马戏团日 你要来吗？

translation.en: Wouldn't miss it for the world.
[giggles] I love the circus. Circus, circus, circus circus!
translation.zh: （重新盛大开演！） 我爱这家马戏团 马戏团！

translation.en: -You did this? -Well, I... I had a little help.
translation.zh: 这都是你弄的？ 我有个小帮手
没错 就是你 宝贝

translation.en: -When's this gonna end? -Can't be soon enough.
-I thought there were going to be animals. -[snoring]
-This is so totally boring. -[scoffs] I know, right?
translation.zh: -真的很无聊 -我知道 是吧？

translation.en: -Agh, I mean, like, look at that. Dumb. -Ew. I know.
translation.zh: -看看那个 傻傻的 -我知道

translation.en: This is bad. This is bad.
They didn't come here to see acrobats. They didn't come here to see clowns.
translation.zh: 他们不是来看杂技的 他们不是来看小丑的

translation.en: What they want is what they got before, Buffalo Bob's Amazing Animals!
translation.zh: 他们想看的是之前看过的 布法罗·鲍勃的神奇动物
好的 女士们、先生们

translation.en: of Bulletman and his Cannon of Doom!
translation.zh: 子弹侠和他的末日大炮！

translation.en: You stop that! Don't laugh at Bulletman!
translation.zh: 别笑了 不准嘲笑子弹侠！

translation.en: Come on! We want some animals! Let's go here!
translation.zh: 快点！我们要看动物 让动物出来

translation.en: This is a disaster! I have to do something.
translation.zh: 真是灾难！我必须做点什么

translation.en: Oh, no, no, angel, I'm not a performer.
translation.zh: 不 小天使 我不是演员
-所以我就是无法… -动物 爸爸 动物！

translation.en: Next act. Where are my acrobats? Where are my acrobats?
translation.zh: 下一个节目 杂技演员在哪里？

translation.en: Come on! Come on! Come on! Come on!
Well, I just thought I could lend a hand.
translation.zh: 我就是觉得我能搭把手

translation.en: [Chesterfield] Come on. Come on, you big baby.
translation.zh: 快点 你这个大宝宝

translation.en: -[Owen] Are you sure this is safe? -Absolutely!
translation.zh: 你确定这个安全吗？ 绝对安全！

translation.en: -Your Uncle Bob did this ten times a week. -What is that?
translation.zh: -这个节目你叔叔每周要表演十次 -那是什么？

translation.en: Okay, I'm supposed to land in that?
translation.zh: 好吧 我应该降落在那里面吗？

translation.en: Excuse me. I'm not doing this. I'm gonna be killed.
translation.zh: 不好意思 我不干 我会送命的

translation.en: A 1,000-pound horse landing in a very small bowl
translation.zh: 一匹900多斤的马以240公里的时速

translation.en: at 150 miles per hour equals... splat!
translation.zh: 跳进一个非常小的鱼缸内…
好吧 给你 你这个大宝宝

translation.en: -What is that? -I don't know. A trout?
translation.zh: -这是什么？ -我不知道 鳟鱼？

translation.en: Either way, something that's delicious broiled in butter.
translation.zh: 反正用黄油煎一下会很好吃

translation.en: What am I supposed to do--
Mommy? Is Horsey-Daddy gonna be okay?
Oh! I mean, yeah. He is gonna be, uh, fine.
translation.zh: 我是说 对 他会没事的

translation.en: I think it's just part of the act.
translation.zh: 我想这只是表演的一部分

translation.en: You asked for it, you got it.
translation.zh: 你们要求的 现在来了

translation.en: I'm pleased to announce the return of Buffalo Bob's Amazing Animals!
translation.zh: 我很高兴地宣布 布法罗·鲍勃的神奇动物回来了！
-现在 马屁王将要跳下… -马屁王？

translation.en: You couldn't come up with anything cooler?
translation.zh: 你不能取一个酷一点的名字吗？
-海洋饼干？马忍者？ -好吧 别说了

translation.en: Buttercup will leap 100 feet into a fishbowl.
translation.zh: 马屁王将从30米高空跳进一个鱼缸内

translation.en: You know what? I don't feel great about this--

translation.en: Left, left, left! I mean, right. Sorry. Right. Right!
translation.zh: 左边 我是说 右边 抱歉 右边

translation.en: -[Horatio] Who is this? -The Zucchini has done it again!
translation.zh: 这是谁？ 西奇尼再次抓住关键

translation.en: that brings us to the end of tonight's show.
-[crowd gasps] -Please, no one scream at all, or you'll die!
translation.zh: 请不要尖叫 否则小命不保

translation.en: The mighty Bengal tiger is one of the most fearsome predators

translation.en: to walk the face of the Earth.
His razor-sharp fangs will rip flesh and grind bone.
translation.zh: 它锋利的尖牙可以咬碎肉和骨头

translation.en: Be perfectly still, ladies and gentlemen.

translation.en: I think this ferocious feline has found...
translation.zh: 我想这头凶猛的猫科动物 已经找到了…
你准备好开心一下了吗？

translation.en: [Chesterfield] She's... She's taming the savage beast!
little Mackenzie Huntington is the queen of the circus.
translation.zh: 小麦肯齐·亨廷顿 是这家马戏团的女王
你的表现很好 孩子

translation.en: And, Zoe, none of this could've happened without you.
translation.zh: 佐伊 没有你就没有这一切

translation.en: -Hmm? What's that? -I said you were right, and--
translation.zh: 你说什么？ 我说你是对的 还有…

translation.en: No, I'm just not sure if I heard you.
translation.zh: 我没有…不 我就是不确定我听见你了

translation.en: -I said you were right. -So let me just hear it one more time.
translation.zh: -我说了你是对的 -那么让我再听一次

translation.en: Can we do it again, Daddy?
translation.zh: 我们可以再来一次吗 爸爸？

translation.en: So what are we saying here?
I'm gonna quit my job at Woodley's first thing tomorrow
translation.zh: 我明天第一件事 就是辞掉伍氏的工作

translation.en: The Huntingtons are back in the circus business!
translation.zh: 亨廷顿家族重回马戏行业了！

translation.en: You heard the man. We're back!
translation.zh: 你们听见他的话了 我们回来了！

translation.en: Acrobats, more sparkles on your leotards.
translation.zh: 杂技演员 你们的紧身衣上多点亮片

translation.en: Clowns, I wanna see your size 42 shoes so shiny
translation.zh: 小丑 我要看见 你们把42码的鞋擦得蹭亮

translation.en: -I could see my bulbous nose in it. -[squeaking]
translation.zh: 我要能看见我的球鼻倒影

translation.en: Tomorrow, Zucchini, take the cookies from him after he quits his job.
translation.zh: 明天 西奇尼 他辞职以后把饼干搞到手
等他一个人 没有防备

translation.en: You took my daughter away from me!
translation.zh: 你从我身边夺走了女儿

translation.en: She's out there somewhere, dressed up as a clown or a horse
translation.zh: 她在外面不知道哪个地方 打扮成小丑或是马

translation.en: or whatever it is you circus people do!
translation.zh: 或者就是你们马戏团的人会做的事！
我们娱乐大众 伍德利先生

translation.en: Look, Zoe's just ten minutes away.
translation.zh: 听我说 佐伊离这里只有十分钟车程

translation.en: You can visit her any time.
Well, I know she and Mack would love to see you.
translation.zh: 我知道她和小麦很想见到你
我正想着 伍德利先生

translation.en: Running away to join the circus?
-You've got quitter all over you. -All right.
translation.zh: -你全身散发着辞职的味道 -好吧

translation.en: Like some kind of quitter cooties or something.
translation.zh: 像是身上长了了辞职虱子
那就是我 辞职的欧文

translation.en: Excuse me. Have a nice life.

translation.zh: -饼干！ -嘿 等等！不行！还给我！

translation.en: -Don't mind if I do. -Wait! No! Wait, Brock. Hey, trust me.
translation.zh: -不介意我尝一块 -等等 不行！等等 布罗克 相信我
别这么小气 亨廷顿

translation.en: You're gonna wanna listen. Wait, no, Brock!
translation.zh: 你得听我说 等等 别吃 亨廷顿！

translation.en: Technically, you have a blue butt, so you're a mandrill,
translation.zh: 确切的说你有蓝色的屁股 所以你是一只山魈

translation.en: which is like a baboon, but not.
translation.zh: 像是狒狒 但其实不是

translation.en: -I have a blue butt! -Wait, no! Brock!
translation.zh: -我的屁股是蓝色的！ -等等 不要！布罗克！
别再找借口了 宾克丽

translation.en: This time, the dog biscuits are going to be perfect.
translation.zh: 这一次会做出完美的狗饼干

translation.en: -A baboon! -What did you do to me, Huntington?
translation.zh: -狒狒！ -你对我做了什么 亨廷顿？
-狮子 -你什么都不配 布罗克

translation.en: -Get out of there. -You think I want-- Ah!
Get out of there, you coward.
translation.zh: 下来 你这个胆小鬼

translation.en: Come on. I just calibrated it!
translation.zh: 别这样 我刚调试好的

translation.en: Yeah, sorry about the mess, Binkley.
translation.zh: 对 抱歉搞得一团乱 宾克丽

translation.en: -But-- -Brock stole one of my animal crackers
translation.zh: -但怎么… -布罗克偷吃了我的动物饼干

translation.en: -and turned himself into a baboon. -But he'll... He...
Cookies that turn you into animals.
I don't wanna have a blue butt!
I can turn you back if you give me the box!
translation.zh: 如果你把那盒子还给我 我可以把你变回来

translation.en: You'll get a big box of nothing!
translation.zh: 你会得到一个大大的空盒子

translation.en: Like a shadow in the night, the Zucchini approaches his prey
translation.zh: 就像夜色的中阴影 西奇尼接近他的猎物

translation.en: with all the predatory instincts and stealth of--
translation.zh: 凭借着所有的捕猎本能和隐秘的…

translation.en: If you'll excuse me, it's sleepy time for Brocky-poo.
translation.zh: 如果你能原谅我 布罗克宝宝要睡觉了

translation.en: Another victory for the magnificent Zucchini!
translation.zh: 尊贵的又一次获得胜利

translation.en: So dashing, so daring, so mascu--
translation.zh: 非常时髦、非常迷人、非常阳刚…

translation.en: If he's not my nephew, why bring him here, you fumbling feather brain?
translation.zh: 如果他不是我侄子 带他来干吗 你脑袋坏了？

translation.en: But these are useless, you second-rate simpleton!
translation.zh: 但这些没用了 你这个二傻子！

translation.en: Ah! The nerve of him. After all I've done for that boy.
translation.zh: 我为那小子做了那么多之后 他可真有勇气

translation.en: I should never have let my little Zoe marry that circus freak.
translation.zh: 我就不应该 把我的小佐伊嫁给那个马戏团疯子
说起来 布罗克在哪里？
温克丽！宾林克丽？ 巴克丽？怀克丽？

translation.en: -Uh... you, what are you doing here? -I was--

translation.zh: -你见到布罗克了吗？ -没有 先生

translation.en: -He should be here somewhere. -But I was hoping that--
translation.zh: -我应该在附近 -哦 但我希望…

translation.en: Brock! Where is that man? Brock!
translation.zh: 布罗克！他在哪里？布罗克！

translation.en: I have something important that I need to tell you,
translation.zh: 我有重要的事要告诉你

translation.en: and I... I... I demand that you listen to me!
Now sit your butt in that chair and listen up!
translation.zh: 现在乖乖坐好 仔细听着！

translation.en: Oh, my goodness. What is wrong with you?
translation.zh: 天哪 你有什么毛病？

translation.en: -You almost gave me a heart attack! -That had to be scary. Sorry.
translation.zh: -你差点害我犯心脏病！ -是很吓人 对不起

translation.en: Okay, but change back and tell me what happened with my father.
translation.zh: 好的 赶紧变回去 再告诉我跟我爸谈得怎么样

translation.en: -Um... -You quit? Yeah. I totally did. It was great.
translation.zh: -你辞职了？ -对 彻底辞了 赶紧很棒

translation.en: -Thank you. -We're going to be so happy.
translation.zh: -谢谢 -我们会过得非常幸福的

translation.en: It has to be in here somewhere!
I looked like 100 times. It's not--
translation.zh: 我找了无数遍了 没有…

translation.en: -Trust me. What? No! They-- -Try this one.
translation.zh: -相信我 什么？不！它们… -试试这个

translation.en: Maybe there's just too many cookies to see it!
translation.zh: 也许就是饼干太多了找不到！

translation.en: Maybe eat some more to clear up some space.
translation.zh: 也许要吃掉一点腾出空间

translation.en: -Try this one. -The box always stays full.
translation.zh: -试试这个 -盒子一直都是满的

translation.en: Maybe not, if you eat faster. You've got to eat faster!
translation.zh: 也许你吃快点就不会 你要快点吃！

translation.en: Please eat faster! Please eat faster!
Zoe! Zoe! Stop! It's not here!
Look, the box keeps adding new animals, but not new human cookies.
translation.zh: 听着 盒子里会不停出现 新的动物饼干 但不会出现新的人形饼干

translation.en: There's only one of those, and it's gone, Zoe.
translation.zh: 人形饼干只有一块 它不见了 佐伊

translation.en: No, I will not accept that.
There's got to be a way to get you human again.
translation.zh: 会有办法让你变回人类

translation.en: we're just gonna tough it out, gonna make it work.
translation.zh: 我们只要挺过去 事情会解决

translation.en: I mean, how hard can it be?
translation.zh: 我是说 这能有多难呢？

translation.en: I hold it to be true.
What happened to you? You eat a bad banana? [chuckles]
translation.zh: 你怎么了？你吃了烂香蕉？
哦 听着 孩子 听我说

translation.en: I know it's been hard these last couple weeks.
translation.zh: 我知道这几个星期你不好过

translation.en: spending your life without opposable thumbs.
translation.zh: 过着大拇指碰不到其他拇指的生活
-大家都对你避之… -你没在安慰我啊

translation.en: You're shedding everywhere, shunned by the entire world.
translation.zh: 你到处掉毛 大家都对你避之不及

translation.en: You and Zoe brought life back to this circus.
translation.zh: 你和佐伊让马戏团重获生机

translation.en: You've not only brought our circus family together,
translation.zh: 你们不仅让马戏团家人团结起来

translation.en: but you've brought tons of other families together
translation.zh: 也把很多家庭团结起来

translation.en: to laugh and cheer and eat overpriced cotton candy.
translation.zh: 让他们欢声笑语 吃着高价的棉花糖

translation.en: That's gotta count for something, right?
translation.zh: 别这样 也是有价值的 对吗？
小丑出了名的说谎话不眨眼

translation.en: -What are you-- -I've just come to talk, my boy.
translation.zh: -你来干… -我就是来跟你聊聊 我的孩子

translation.en: Just a moment of your time.

translation.zh: 对 布法罗·鲍勃声名远扬的

translation.en: of Buffalo Bob's Rootin' Tootin' Animal Circus.
translation.zh: 动物马戏团的盛大重演

translation.en: Odd that you kept my brother's name.
translation.zh: 奇怪你继续沿用我弟弟的名字

translation.en: Because it was his circus. What do you want, Horatio?
translation.zh: 因为这是他的马戏团 你要干吗 霍雷肖？

translation.en: I have a proposal for you.
What could you have that I would possibly--
translation.zh: 不管你提什么建议 我都不可能…

translation.en: I'm offering you a chance to become human again.
translation.zh: 我可以提供让你变回人的机会

translation.en: Wouldn't want me to crush it to bits, would you?
Just tell me what you want for it?
Why, my boy, I simply want what was rightfully mine.
translation.zh: 我的孩子 我只想要回属于我的东西
-什么？ -一旦我得到了那些动物饼干…

translation.en: The circus is no good without them, is it?
translation.zh: 没有饼干这马戏团毫无用处 是吗？

translation.en: I'll only make this offer once.
Well, that's how the cookie crumbles.

translation.zh: -变回人类 -想想你的家人 欧文

translation.en: What would they want you to do?
Do you think they want a filthy beast for a husband?
translation.zh: 你认为她们想要一个 肮脏的畜生做他们的丈夫？

translation.en: Yes, yes, your family. Now, do we have a deal?
translation.zh: 对 你的家人 你接受我的建议吗？

translation.en: Do you wish to remain a wretched animal for the rest of your life?
translation.zh: 你想下半辈子都当个可怜的动物吗？

translation.en: If being a wretched animal lets me keep my family together,
translation.zh: 如果当一个可怜的动物 能让我和家人在一起

translation.en: Because I'll be a gorilla or a horse or a rhinoceros
translation.zh: 因为我愿意当一个大猩猩 一匹马或一只河马

translation.en: or whatever filthy beast I have to be
translation.zh: 或者任何一种肮脏的畜生

translation.en: I was afraid you would have too much of my brother in you.
translation.zh: 我一直担心 你受我弟弟的影响太深

translation.en: It seems we'll have to do this the hard way.
Apparently, one does not need to eat the entire animal cracker
translation.zh: 显而易见 不用吃下整块饼干

translation.en: to assume the attributes of said animal.
translation.zh: 也能出现那种动物的特征
我们把交易完成 怎么样？

translation.en: -Get off me. -After all, a deal is a deal.
translation.zh: -放开我 -毕竟 交易就是交易

translation.en: And I would rather not deal with an 800-pound gorilla.
translation.zh: 我其实不想和700多斤的大猩猩交易

translation.en: Yes, I would rather deal with pathetic little you.
translation.zh: 没错 我宁愿和可怜的你交易

translation.en: Hey, what's all the barking about?
translation.zh: 嘿 什么事情那么吵？

translation.en: Now, attention acrobats, jugglers, stage hands, clowns.
translation.zh: 现在听好了 杂技的、杂耍的 管舞台的、扮小丑的

translation.en: I would like to announce the immediate takeover of this circus.
translation.zh: 我宣布即刻接管这家马戏团

translation.en: As of this moment, you are all fired.
translation.zh: 从现在起你们都被解雇了

translation.en: Is that the best you got? Hey, Stabby, my turn!
translation.zh: 你就这点本事？ 喂 斯呆比 轮到我了！

translation.en: Why did you drag me here? You know how I feel about the--
translation.zh: 你拉我来这里干什么？ 你知道我对这里的看法…
那个又是兔子又是乌龟的东西

translation.en: just got drop-kicked by a duck-billed platypus!
translation.zh: 刚刚被一只鸭嘴兽踹飞了！
霍雷肖 我拿到饼干盒了！
抱歉 霍雷肖 但我不能…

translation.en: You lack the vision to truly create something
translation.zh: 你们目光短浅 无法创造出
你们用饼干来娱乐大众

translation.en: but I... I will use them to rule the world!
translation.zh: 但我会用它们统治世界
我是奇美拉怪兽霍雷肖
霍雷肖！ 哥哥 停手吧！
-罗伯特？ -你必须停止这种疯狂行为！

translation.en: But I thought you were both killed.
translation.zh: 我以为你们两个都死了

translation.en: Not killed, but we can never be human again.
translation.zh: 没有死 但我们再也变不回人类了

translation.en: You see, that fire you started destroyed our human cookies.
translation.zh: 你引起的火灾烧毁了我们的人形饼干

translation.en: what's in the past is in the past.
Is this really how you want to be seen?
translation.zh: 这真的是你想见到的吗？

translation.en: How you want to live your life? Like this?
translation.zh: 你想怎么生活？像这样吗？

translation.en: Better this than a broken-down old man, Robert.
translation.zh: 总比当糟老头子好 罗伯特
子弹侠 钻进你的大炮！

translation.en: Don't eat this until after I fire you.
translation.zh: 等我把你发射出去你再吃下去

translation.en: Hello, my little monkey Mackenzie darling.
translation.zh: 你好 我亲爱的小猴子麦肯齐

translation.en: Do you not see the utter futility of your endeavors, boy?
translation.zh: 你没看出来 自己是白费功夫吗 孩子？

translation.en: Can you not smell the destruction of all you know and love?
translation.zh: 你没察觉 你知道和爱的一切会毁灭吗？

translation.en: It has to be somewhere. Come on.
Unhand me this instant, you over-muscled oaf!
translation.zh: 马上放手 肌肉白痴！

translation.en: I hold it true, what e'er befall.
translation.zh: 无论如此 我坚信这一点

translation.en: I feel it when I sorrow most.
'Tis better to have loved and lost
How will we ever top this performance?
translation.zh: 我们以后的表演怎么能超过这一次？

translation.en: You ate the broken pieces, you doofuses!
translation.zh: 你们吃掉了破碎的饼干 笨蛋

translation.en: That means you have broken pieces in the box.
translation.zh: 也就是说盒子里 你们的人形饼干也是碎的

translation.en: It's gonna take time to figure out who's who.
translation.zh: 要搞清楚谁是谁需要花点时间

translation.en: You want his arm and his leg on your body?
translation.zh: 你想要他的手和他的脚 装在你的身体上吗？

translation.en: Take your time. The Zucchini can wait.
translation.zh: 你慢慢来 西奇尼可以等

translation.en: Do you not know what I am?
translation.zh: 你们不知道我是什么吗？
哦 我想死你的嘴唇了
-我们成功了 佐伊 -我们成功了

translation.en: Aw. Just wish my dad could've--

translation.zh: 可以什么 宝贝女儿？

translation.en: -Dad? -I saw what you two did out there.
translation.zh: -爸爸？ -你们的表现我都看见了

translation.en: That whole changing into animals thing!
translation.zh: 还有整个变成动物的事！

translation.en: Owen, I'm so sorry for the way I've treated you.
translation.zh: 欧文 抱歉我以前那么对你

translation.en: You're no nincompoop, quite the opposite.
translation.zh: 你不是笨蛋 恰恰相反

translation.en: And, Zoe, you are an amazing woman.
translation.zh: 还有佐伊 你是了不起的女孩

translation.en: But, of course, I've always known that.
translation.zh: 但当然这点我早就知道了！
外公！ 你好 小猴子！

translation.en: Guess what, Grandpa. I'm in the circus!
translation.zh: 告诉你 外公 我是马戏团一员了！

translation.en: In it? You're gonna be the star!
Let's go get you cleaned up.
So, it turns out Binkley is precisely the genius you said she was.
translation.zh: 所以事实证明正如你所说 宾克丽是个天才
她研制出了一件很神奇的东西

translation.en: Wait till you see what she came up with.
-They just went on sale minutes ago. -Uh, what went on sale?
translation.zh: 几分钟前开售了 什么开售了？

translation.en: Remember those dog biscuits that turned our skin crazy colors?
translation.zh: 记得那些让我们的皮肤 变得五颜六色的狗饼干吗？

translation.en: -I think I threw up on your shoes. -Oof.
translation.zh: 我记得我吐在了你的鞋子上

translation.en: Binkley found a way to turn those failed experiments
translation.zh: 宾克丽找到方法 把这些失败的试验产品

translation.en: [Zoe] Oh, so what do they do?
translation.zh: 那么吃了以后会怎么样？

translation.en: Look at them. They're having a blast!
translation.zh: 看看他们 他们玩得不亦乐乎

translation.en: But, I mean, how will they change back?
We thought it best not to advertise that part. [laughs]
translation.zh: 我们觉得这一部分最好就别宣传了

translation.en: Wow, you still find it funny, I see. Still like it.
translation.zh: 哇 你还是觉得好玩 我明白了 还是喜欢

translation.en: Ha-ha! We're going to be rich, partner.
translation.zh: 我们要发财了 搭档

translation.en: Partner? [giggles] I've never been one of those.
translation.zh: 搭档？我从来没跟人搭档过

translation.en: I mean, like in a game maybe, but not like in a business.
translation.zh: 我是说 也许在游戏里有过 但生意场上没有过

translation.en: Daddy! Daddy! Did you see me ride the pony?
translation.zh: 爸爸！你看见我骑小马了吗？

translation.en: [laughs] She will be the star in no time.
Look at you, my gypsy princess.
translation.zh: 看看你 我的吉普赛公主

translation.en: Do you want me to tell you your fortune?
I think I already know it.

translation.zh: 欧文 亲爱的 你下一个上

translation.en: Welcome to Buffalo Bob's Rootin' Tootin' Animal Circus!
translation.zh: 欢迎来到布法罗·鲍勃 声名远扬的动物马戏团

translation.en: What's life without a little danger?
translation.zh: 没有一点危险 算什么生活啊？

translation.en: Prepare yourselves for something truly amazing!
translation.zh: 准备好欣赏不可思议的表演吧！

translation.en: Prepare yourself for something truly incredible!
translation.zh: 准备好欣赏无与伦比的表演吧！

translation.en: Hey, and, you know, don't burn the place down.
♪I'm living my patience and my motivation I put them on separate teams ♪
translation.zh: （根据斯科特·克里斯汀·萨瓦的 漫画《动物饼干》改编）
